about.title: About Me
about.description:
I’m a Software Engineer with over 9 years of experience in both front-end and back-end development.

I work with modern technologies such as React, Vue, TypeScript, Node.js, and PHP (Laravel). I’m passionate about clean code, accessibility, and responsive user experiences.

Currently working as a Front-End Developer on large-scale projects using React.js, Next.js, and Vue.js, integrating with REST APIs, GraphQL, and WebSockets.

I love scalable architecture, clean patterns, and collaborative teams.
